General.Name: Smithson Investment Trust PLC
General.Description: Smithson Investment Trust plc is a closed ended equity fund launched and managed by Fundsmith LLP. The fund invests public equity markets of United Kingdom. It invest in shares issued by small and mid sized companies with a market capitalization between £500 million to £15 billion. Smithson Investment Trust plc was formed on 19 October 2018 is domiciled in the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 33 Cavendish Square, London, United Kingdom, W1G 0PW
